name: RTCDataChannel.ordered
description: The read-only RTCDataChannel property ordered indicates whether or not the data channel guarantees in-order delivery of messages; the default is true, which indicates that the data channel is indeed ordered.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCDataChannel.ordered' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
